div.p: This case-insensitive code system http://fhir.awmf.org/awmf.ig/CodeSystem/cs-sign-grade-of-recommendation defines the following codes:

tr.td: At least one meta-analysis, systematic review, or RCT rated as 1++, and directly applicable to the target population; or a body of evidence consisting principally of studies rated as 1+, directly applicable to the target population, and demonstrating overall consistency of results.

A body of evidence including studies rated as 2++, directly applicable to the target population, and demonstrating overall consistency of results; or extrapolated evidence from studies rated as 1++ or 1+.
A body of evidence including studies rated as 2+, directly applicable to the target population and demonstrating overall consistency of results; or extrapolated evidence from studies rated as 2++.
Evidence level 3 or 4; or extrapolated evidence from studies rated as 2+; or consensus-based recommendation.

description.value: CodeSystem representing the Scottish Intercollegiate Guidelines Network (SIGN) Grades of Recommendation.

definition.value: At least one meta-analysis, systematic review, or RCT rated as 1++, and directly applicable to the target population; or a body of evidence consisting principally of studies rated as 1+, directly applicable to the target population, and demonstrating overall consistency of results.

valueString.value: Mindestens eine Metaanalyse, systematische Review oder RCT mit 1++ bewertet und direkt auf die Zielpopulation anwendbar; oder ein Evidenzkörper bestehend hauptsächlich aus Studien mit 1+ bewertet, direkt auf die Zielpopulation anwendbar und mit konsistenten Ergebnissen.

definition.value: A body of evidence including studies rated as 2++, directly applicable to the target population, and demonstrating overall consistency of results; or extrapolated evidence from studies rated as 1++ or 1+.

valueString.value: Evidenzkörper mit Studien bewertet als 2++, direkt auf die Zielpopulation anwendbar und mit konsistenten Ergebnissen; oder extrapolierte Evidenz aus Studien bewertet als 1++ oder 1+.

definition.value: A body of evidence including studies rated as 2+, directly applicable to the target population and demonstrating overall consistency of results; or extrapolated evidence from studies rated as 2++.

valueString.value: Evidenzkörper mit Studien bewertet als 2+, direkt auf die Zielpopulation anwendbar und mit konsistenten Ergebnissen; oder extrapolierte Evidenz aus Studien bewertet als 2++.

definition.value: Evidence level 3 or 4; or extrapolated evidence from studies rated as 2+; or consensus-based recommendation.

valueString.value: Evidenzlevel 3 oder 4; oder extrapolierte Evidenz aus Studien bewertet als 2+; oder konsensbasierte Empfehlung.
